title: JINGKU
description: ARE YOU THE PIG OR THE FENCE? In a small and ancient Hmong kingdom, a new leader arises. But with a new leader means a new ring of followers and not all people wish to follow...When Shu, a teenage boy, refuses to go through with the tradition of abandoning his family in order to serve the new ruler for life, a girl must erase her identity and take his place to save them from the possible consequences of betraying the kingdom! Forced to learn the ways of the ancient Hmong kingdom in order to survive, will our main character be able to overcome the struggles of choosing to stand as a fence for her family, or will she fail miserably and find herself as the weak domestic pig that the world has always seen her as?A historically fictitious tale full of action and adventure with a heavy side dose of drama from Hmong ethnic indie artist DA-POW!.
author: DA-POW! (Yayao Yuying STU)
